```py
>>> a = np.array([1, 2, 3])
>>> a.flags["WRITEABLE"] = False
>>> b = np.copy(a)
>>> b.flags["WRITEABLE"]
True
>>> b[0] = 3
>>> b
array([3, 2, 3]) 
```

```py
>>> a = np.array([1, 'm', [2, 3, 4]], dtype=object)
>>> b = np.copy(a)
>>> b[2][0] = 10
>>> a
array([1, 'm', list([10, 3, 4])], dtype=object) 
```

```py
>>> import copy
>>> a = np.array([1, 'm', [2, 3, 4]], dtype=object)
>>> c = copy.deepcopy(a)
>>> c[2][0] = 10
>>> c
array([1, 'm', list([10, 3, 4])], dtype=object)
>>> a
array([1, 'm', list([2, 3, 4])], dtype=object) 
```
